name: MaFl_Teshar
oralText: Listen up, Soldiers of Kion! We've got a new directive from the Mayor of Flarine! It's time to train!
introText: Are you looking for work? We can always use another  hired hand here. You look like you have some skill. Show me what you got!
byeText: Farewell, champion! See you on the battlefield!

links.title: Who are you?
texts: My name is Teshar Testarotsa and I'm the leader of this rag-tag bunch. I manage the house of Hero, Eiene. Have you come to join our team?

links.title: Goodbye!
texts: Farewell, champion! See you on the battlefield!
